fact.description: The match is underway at Arena Pantanal.
Can Japan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Colombia's half?
Colombia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pedro Proenca signals a free kick to Japan in their own half.
Pedro Proenca signals a Colombia throw-in in Japan's half.
Japan have a goal kick.
Colombia to take a throw-in in Japan territory.
Free kick Japan.
Pedro Proenca signals a free kick to Japan.
Pedro Proenca signals a Colombia throw-in in Japan's half.
Yoshito Okubo (Japan) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Ball goes out of play for a Japan goal kick.
Ball safe as Colombia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Yoshito Okubo (Japan) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Japan's Yoshito Okubo breaks free at Arena Pantanal. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Colombia at Arena Pantanal.
Pedro Proenca awards Japan a goal kick.
Pedro Proenca signals a free kick to Japan in their own half.
Throw-in for Japan in their own half.
Corner awarded to Japan.
Throw-in Colombia.
Japan have been awarded a corner by Pedro Proenca.
In Cuiaba Japan drive forward through Makoto Hasebe. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Yasuyuki Konno for Japan has been booked by Pedro Proenca and receives a first yellow card.
Penalty! Pedro Proenca points to the spot, great chance for Colombia...
Juan Cuadrado converts the penalty to give Colombia a 0-1 lead.
Throw-in for Japan at Arena Pantanal.
Can Japan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Colombia's half?
Corner awarded to Japan.
Can Japan capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Colombia's half?
Free kick Japan.
Colombia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Japan's Keisuke Honda gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Colombia defender.
Throw-in for Japan at Arena Pantanal.
Japan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Japan's Shinji Kagawa is on target but unsuccessful.
Japan have been awarded a corner by Pedro Proenca.
Japan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pedro Proenca signals a free kick to Japan.
Pedro Proenca signals a throw-in for Japan, close to Colombia's area.
Japan have been awarded a corner by Pedro Proenca.
Free kick Japan.
Keisuke Honda for Japan gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Throw-in Japan.
Goal kick for Japan at Arena Pantanal.
Pedro Proenca signals a free kick to Colombia.
Pedro Proenca awards Japan a goal kick.
Japan to take a throw-in in Colombia territory.
Japan are pushing forward but Yoshito Okubo's finish is wide of the goal.
Colombia have a goal kick.
Pedro Proenca signals a free kick to Japan in their own half.
In Cuiaba Colombia attack through Juan Quintero. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Japan goal kick.
Can Colombia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Japan's half?
Japan push forward at Arena Pantanal and Shinji Kagawa gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Colombia defence.
Corner awarded to Japan.
Colombia's Jackson Martinez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Japan goal kick.
Ball safe as Japan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Pedro Proenca signals a free kick to Japan.
Colombia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Pedro Proenca signals a Japan throw-in in Colombia's half.
Goal kick for Colombia at Arena Pantanal.
At Arena Pantanal the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the first half.
In Cuiaba, Toshihiro Aoyama of Japan is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
That's a fine assist from Keisuke Honda.
Colombia awarded a free kick in their own half.
The first-half has ended.
James Rodriguez is replacing Juan Quintero for Colombia at Arena Pantanal.
Colombia make their second substitution with Carlos Carbonero replacing Juan Cuadrado.
Japan to take a throw-in in Colombia territory.
Throw-in for Colombia in their own half.
Free kick Colombia.
Free kick Colombia.
Pedro Proenca signals a free kick to Colombia.
Important block from the Japan defence as James Rodriguez fires in a strike for Colombia.
Colombia have been awarded a corner by Pedro Proenca.
Colombia drive upfield and Adrian Ramos gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Japan defender.
Throw-in for Colombia at Arena Pantanal.
Adrian Ramos of Colombia is pulled up for offside.
Colombia drive forward but Jackson Martinez is judged offside.
Japan needs to be cautious. Colombia have an attacking throw-in.
Pedro Proenca signals a free kick to Colombia.
Carlos Carbonero of Colombia gets in a strike, but is off target.
Japan have a goal kick.
James Rodriguez with an assist there.
Colombia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Pedro Proenca signals a Colombia throw-in in Japan's half.
In Cuiaba Japan attack through Shinji Kagawa. The finish is off target, however.
Pedro Proenca awards Colombia a goal kick.
Pedro Proenca signals a free kick to Colombia in their own half.
Pablo Armero is back on his feet again.
Play has been resumed.
Pablo Armero is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Throw-in for Japan close to the penalty box.
Japan’s Shinji Okazaki is on his feet again at Arena Pantanal.
Shinji Okazaki is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Play has been resumed.
Hotaru Yamaguchi is on a sub for Toshihiro Aoyama for Japan.
Free kick Japan.
Fredy Guarin (Colombia) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Japan's Yoshito Okubo attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Colombia have a goal kick.
Japan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Japan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Yoshito Okubo for Japan gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Colombia at Arena Pantanal.
Throw-in for Colombia in their own half.
Japan have a dangerous throw-in.
Pedro Proenca awards Colombia a goal kick.
Pedro Proenca signals a free kick to Japan in their own half.
Yoichiro Kakitani (Japan) has replaced the possibly injured Shinji Okazaki at Arena Pantanal.
Corner awarded to Japan.
Corner awarded to Japan.
Ball goes out of play for a Japan goal kick.

Japan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jackson Martinez (Colombia) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.

Ball goes out of play for a Japan goal kick.

Throw-in Colombia.

Japan have been awarded a corner by Pedro Proenca.
Pedro Proenca signals a free kick to Colombia in their own half.
Japan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Japan to take a throw-in in Colombia territory.
James Rodriguez instrumental with a fine assist.
Japan are coming forward and Shinji Kagawa gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Pedro Proenca awards Colombia a goal kick.
Colombia make their third substitution with Faryd Mondragon replacing David Ospina.
Alberto Zaccheroni (Japan) is making a third substitution, with Hiroshi Kiyotake replacing Shinji Kagawa.
Colombia's Jackson Martinez has run offside.
Pedro Proenca signals a Japan throw-in in Colombia's half.
Goal kick for Colombia at Arena Pantanal.
Throw-in for Colombia in their own half.
Pedro Proenca signals a free kick to Japan in their own half.
Colombia's Santiago Arias gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Japan have a goal kick.
Great play from Adrian Ramos to set up the goal.
Pedro Proenca will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the second half.
Throw-in for Japan at Arena Pantanal.
Yoichiro Kakitani for Japan drives towards goal at Arena Pantanal. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Can Japan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Colombia's half?
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-4.
